# 06 Functions of multiple variables, part 2

## Exercise 1: Plotting using cross sections

::: {.callout-note icon="false" appearance="minimal"}

Plot the graphs of the following functions using cross sections.

a. $f(x,y) =-x^2 - y^2$
b. $g(x,y) = y^3 + xy$
c. $h(x,y) = \sqrt{1-x^2-y^2}$
d. $k(x,y) = e^{-x^2-y^2}$
e. $m(x,y) = x^2$

Check your plots using [Desmos](https://www.desmos.com/3d){target="_blank"}.

:::
